name: Learn: Colors
description:
With Learn: Colors your kid will be able to learn the basic colors. 

Includes two modes:

1. Learn

  • Touch the color to hear the pronunciation
  • Spelling for colors are also shown

2. Challenge

  • Your kid will have to select the correct answer out of three options.
  • Challenge types:
  1. Match - Match the color spelling with the corresponding image.
  • Colors to match can be configured in settings

Different languages available. (Can be configured in settings)

Let us know about other learning activities you would like to add!!
